snippet: SELF-COMPLACENCY was never more charmingly illustrated than in an article on "Journalism," wherewith we are favored in Saturday's Evening Express. The one juryman, who had to bring around eleven wrong-headed follows, before he could get a sensible...
lead_paragraph: SELF-COMPLACENCY was never more charmingly illustrated than in an article on "Journalism," wherewith we are favored in Saturday's Evening Express. The one juryman, who had to bring around eleven wrong-headed follows, before he could get a sensible verdict, was no touch to this modest essayist. For instance:
